auroraveil.shortDesc: For 5 turns, damage to allies is halved. Hail only.

autotomize.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1kg.

banefulbunker.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
banefulbunker.name: Baneful Bunker

barrage.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

beakblast.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.

beakblast.shortDesc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.

beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

belch.desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.

belch.shortDesc: Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.

bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.

bestow.desc: The target receives the user's held item. bestow.shortDesc: User passes its held item to the target.

bide.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during the two turns. This move does not check accuracy.

The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. coreenforcer.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change, this effect does not happen.

Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's physical attack this turn.

covet.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

covet.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.

darkestlariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

dig.name: Dig

disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move.
disable.name: Disable
disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

disarmingvoice.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
disarmingvoice.name: Disarming Voice
disarmingvoice.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.name: Discharge

dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
dive.name: Dive

dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch

doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
doomdesire.name: Doom Desire
doomdesire.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
doubleedge.name: Double-Edge

doublehit.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
doublehit.name: Double Hit

doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
doublekick.name: Double Kick

doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
doubleslap.name: Double Slap

doubleteam.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.
doubleteam.name: Double Team

dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath

dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

dragonrage.desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
dragonrage.name: Dragon Rage

dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush

dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Ability Suction Cups, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
drillrun.name: Drill Run

dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
dualchop.name: Dual Chop

dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch

earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.

earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dig.

echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.
electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain

electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1.
electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.

electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

embargo.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target can't use any items.

ember.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
ember.name: Ember

encore.desc: For 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.
encore.name: Encore
encore.shortDesc: The target repeats its last move for 3 turns.

endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.name: Endure
endure.shortDesc: The user survives the next hit with at least 1 HP.

energyball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.name: Energy Ball
energyball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.

entrainment.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype, Stance Change, Truant, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, or Zen Mode.
entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.

eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.
explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
extrasensory.name: Extrasensory

extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extremeevoboost.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.name: Facade
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if this move was used successfully last turn.
fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
featherdance.name: Feather Dance

feint.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
feint.name: Feint
feint.shortDesc: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

feintattack.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

fellstinger.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

fierydance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
fierydance.name: Fiery Dance
fierydance.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

finalgambit.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
finalgambit.name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fireblast.name: Fire Blast

firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

firelash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
firelash.name: Fire Lash
firelash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

firepledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 Base Power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 Base Power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Ability Serene Grace. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
firepledge.name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
firepunch.name: Fire Punch

firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

firstimpression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only.

fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.
fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

flail.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.
flail.name: Flail
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, each ally adjacent to the target loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Ability Magic Guard.
flameburst.name: Flame Burst
flameburst.shortDesc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.name: Flamethrower

flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
flash.name: Flash

flashcannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

fleurcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleurcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Ability Harvest. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Ability Klutz.
fling.name: Fling
fling.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
floralhealing.name: Floral Healing
floralhealing.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
fly.name: Fly
fly.shortDesc: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.name: Flying Press
flyingpress.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.
followme.name: Follow Me
followme.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
forcepalm.name: Force Palm

foresight.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.name: Forest's Curse
forestscurse.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
freezeshock.name: Freeze Shock

frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant

frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.
frostbreath.name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
frustration.name: Frustration

furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
furyattack.name: Fury Attack

furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power; power is reset if the move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes

fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare.

fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt.

futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change.
gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid

geargrind.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
geargrind.name: Gear Grind

gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.
gearup.name: Gear Up
gearup.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact

glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

grassknot.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.
grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 Base Power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 Base Power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

grasswhistle.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle

grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain

gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Ability Levitate. Fails if this move is already in effect.
gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.shortDesc: For 5 turns, negates all Ground immunities.

growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
growl.name: Growl

growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day, raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
growth.name: Growth
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if a foe's attack knocks the user out, that foe loses all remaining PP for that attack.
grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola
guardianofalola.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
guardsplit.name: Guard Split
guardsplit.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.

guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.name: Guard Swap
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.
guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot

gust.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.
gust.name: Gust
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Fly, Bounce, and Sky Drop.

gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed), rounded down, + 1, but not more than 150.
gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.

hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type, or have the Abilities Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
hail.name: Hail

hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm

harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
harden.name: Harden

haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
haze.name: Haze

headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
headbutt.name: Headbutt

headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headcharge.name: Head Charge

headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headsmash.name: Head Smash

healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Ability Soundproof are not cured.
healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Ability Regenerator are unaffected.
healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

healingwish.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Replacement is fully healed.

healorder.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.name: Heal Order
healorder.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Ability Mega Launcher, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp

heartswap.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
heartswap.name: Heart Swap
heartswap.shortDesc: Swaps all stat changes with target.

heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
heatwave.name: Heat Wave

heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less.
heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a major status condition.
hex.name: Hex
hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Ability Magic Guard are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.name: Hold Back
holdback.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

holdhands.desc: Nothing happens... Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.shortDesc: No competitive use. Or any use.

honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
honeclaws.name: Hone Claws
honeclaws.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.

horndrill.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.
horndrill.name: Horn Drill
horndrill.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

howl.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
howl.name: Howl

hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.
hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon

hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam

hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang

hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protection.

hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspacehole.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
hypnosis.name: Hypnosis

iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icebeam.name: Ice Beam

iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
iceburn.name: Ice Burn

icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
icefang.name: Ice Fang
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
icehammer.name: Ice Hammer

icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icepunch.name: Ice Punch

iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash

iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear

icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

imprison.desc: The user prevents all of its foes from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
incinerate.name: Incinerate

inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
inferno.name: Inferno

infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Ability Levitate.
ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.shortDesc: User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn. Traps user.

instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the move is...
instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
irondefense.name: Iron Defense

ironhead.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
ironhead.name: Iron Head

irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

judgment.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Plate.

jumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Ability Magic Guard are unaffected by crash damage.
jumpkick.name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
karatechop.name: Karate Chop

kinesis.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
kinesis.name: Kinesis

kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.name: King's Shield
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from attacks. Contact try: lowers Atk by 2.

knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Ability Sticky Hold, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item, cause Pokemon that can Mega Evolve to lose the Mega Stone for their species, or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, or Drive, respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

landswrath.name: Land's Wrath
landswrath.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

laserfocus.desc: On the next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit. Fails if the user already has the effect.
laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
laserfocus.shortDesc: Next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit.

lastresort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
lastresort.name: Last Resort
lastresort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

lavaplume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
lavaplume.name: Lava Plume

leafblade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
leafblade.name: Leaf Blade

leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

leaftornado.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
leaftornado.name: Leaf Tornado
leaftornado.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

leechlife.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
leechlife.name: Leech Life
leechlife.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

leechseed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
leer.name: Leer

lick.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.name: Lick

lightofruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin

lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.
lightscreen.name: Light Screen
lightscreen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

lightthatburnsthesky.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's higher attacking stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
lightthatburnsthesky.name: Light That Burns the Sky
lightthatburnsthesky.shortDesc: Uses higher attacking stat for DMG. Ignores ability.

liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

lockon.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.
lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

lovelykiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss

lowkick.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.
lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

lowsweep.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

luckychant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
luckychant.name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

lunardance.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
lunardance.name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.shortDesc: User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.

lunge.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

lusterpurge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge
lusterpurge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

magicalleaf.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf
magicalleaf.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

magiccoat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. If the user has the Ability Soundproof, this move's effect happens before a sound-based move can be nullified. The Abilities Lightning Rod and Storm Drain redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.
magiccoat.name: Magic Coat

magicroom.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
magicroom.name: Magic Room
magicroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

magikarpsrevenge.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target and lower its Defense and Special Attack by 1 stage. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If this move is successful, the weather changes to rain unless it is already in effect, and the user gains the effects of Aqua Ring and Magic Coat.
magikarpsrevenge.name: Magikarp's Revenge
magikarpsrevenge.shortDesc: Does many things turn 1. Can't move turn 2.

magmastorm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
magmastorm.name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

magnetbomb.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnetbomb.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

magneticflux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.
magneticflux.name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

magnetrise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground moves.

magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

matblock.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
matblock.name: Mat Block
matblock.shortDesc: Protects allies from attacks. First turn out only.

meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
meanlook.name: Mean Look

meditate.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meditate.name: Meditate

mefirst.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Thief, or Struggle. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
megadrain.name: Mega Drain
megadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
memento.name: Memento
memento.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

metalburst.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with an attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's attack this turn.
metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

metalsound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Assist, Belch, Bestow, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Happy Hour, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, King's Shield, Light of Ruin, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Relic Song, Secret Sword, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Spiky Shield, Steam Eruption, Struggle, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Transform, Trick, V-create, or Wide Guard.
metronome.name: Metronome

milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

mimic.desc: This move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Mimic, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.
mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

mindblown.desc: The user loses 50% of its max HP to damage the foe.
mindblown.name: Mind Blown
mindblown.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

mindreader.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.
mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.
minimize.name: Minimize

miracleeye.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.
miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye

mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or the last move used was Acupressure, After You, Aromatherapy, Aromatic Mist, Belch, Conversion 2, Counter, Crafty Shield, Curse, Doom Desire, Electric Terrain, Final Gambit, Flower Shield, Focus Punch, Future Sight, Grassy Terrain, Gravity, Guard Split, Hail, Happy Hour, Haze, Heal Bell, Heal Pulse, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Ion Deluge, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Magnetic Flux, Mat Block, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Mist, Misty Terrain, Mud Sport, Nature Power, Perish Song, Power Split, Psych Up, Quick Guard, Rain Dance, Reflect, Reflect Type, Role Play, Rototiller, Safeguard, Sandstorm, Sketch, Spikes, Spit Up, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Struggle, Sunny Day, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Transform, Water Sport, Wide Guard, or any move that is self-targeting.
mirrormove.name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

mirrorshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mirrorshot.name: Mirror Shot
mirrorshot.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mist.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stats lowered by other Pokemon.
mist.name: Mist
mist.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

mistball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mistball.name: Mist Ball
mistball.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a major status condition nor confusion. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

moonblast.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moongeistbeam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moongeistbeam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeistbeam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

mudbomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudbomb.name: Mud Bomb
mudbomb.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

mudshot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mudsport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.
mudsport.name: Mud Sport
mudsport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

multiattack.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.
multiattack.name: Multi-Attack
multiattack.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Memory.

mysticalfire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Ability Klutz, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

naturesmadness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
naturesmadness.name: Nature's Madness
naturesmadness.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

needlearm.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
needlearm.name: Needle Arm

nightdaze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
nightdaze.name: Night Daze
nightdaze.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
nightslash.name: Night Slash

nobleroar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
nobleroar.name: Noble Roar
nobleroar.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.name: Nuzzle

oblivionwing.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

odorsleuth.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

originpulse.name: Origin Pulse
originpulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

outrage.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

paleowave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
paleowave.name: Paleo Wave
paleowave.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

paraboliccharge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

payback.desc: Power doubles if the target moves before the user; power is not doubled if the target switches out.
payback.name: Payback
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

petaldance.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
phantomforce.name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

photongeyser.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's higher attacking stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser
photongeyser.shortDesc: Uses higher attacking stat in damage calculation.

pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
pinmissile.name: Pin Missile

plasmafists.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playnice.name: Play Nice

playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonjab.name: Poison Jab

poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonsting.name: Poison Sting

poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff
pollenpuff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
powder.name: Powder
powder.shortDesc: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
powdersnow.name: Powder Snow

powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
powersplit.name: Power Split
powersplit.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
powerswap.name: Power Swap
powerswap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

powertrick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats; stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

present.desc: Deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. This move must hit to be effective.
present.name: Present
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target by 1/4 max HP.

prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser

protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.name: Protect
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
