psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.name: Psybeam

psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

psychicterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to do something. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.
psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain

psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
psychocut.name: Psycho Cut

psychoshift.desc: The user's major status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the target already has a major status condition.
psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.shortDesc: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X+50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a major status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
purify.name: Purify
purify.shortDesc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 maxHP if so.

pursuit.desc: If an adjacent foe switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after a foe using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that foe before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits a foe switching out, and the user's turn is over; if a foe faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.shortDesc: Power doubles if a foe is switching out.

quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
quash.name: Quash
quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.

quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quiverdance.name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

rage.desc: Once this move is successfuly used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
rage.name: Rage
rage.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.
ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and partial-trapping moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.
rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.shortDesc: Frees user from hazards/partial trap/Leech Seed.

razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
razorshell.name: Razor Shell
razorshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.name: Recover
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used, if it is not holding an item. Fails if the user was not holding an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Ability Pickup, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Brick Break removes the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.
reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. Fails if the user is an Arceus.
reflecttype.name: Reflect Type
reflecttype.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.
refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

relicsong.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Ability Sheer Force. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.name: Relic Song
relicsong.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any major status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.name: Rest
rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
return.name: Return

revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type.
revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

reversal.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.
reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Ability Suction Cups.
roar.name: Roar
roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
roaroftime.name: Roar of Time

rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
rockblast.name: Rock Blast

rockclimb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
rockclimb.name: Rock Climb

rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
rockpolish.name: Rock Polish

rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
rockslide.name: Rock Slide

rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.
rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker

roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Multitype, Stance Change, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

rollingkick.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick

rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.name: Roost
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
round.name: Round
round.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog.
safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

sandattack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
sandattack.name: Sand Attack

sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Abilities Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil. The Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scald.name: Scald
scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
scaryface.name: Scary Face

screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.
screech.name: Screech

searingshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
searingshot.name: Searing Shot

searingsunrazesmash.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
searingsunrazesmash.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
searingsunrazesmash.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

secretpower.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain. The secondary effect chance is not affected by the Ability Serene Grace.
secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.
selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

shadowbone.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone
shadowbone.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw

shadowforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

shadowpunch.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch
shadowpunch.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

shadowstrike.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowstrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowstrike.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
sharpen.name: Sharpen

sheercold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with Ice typing or with the Ability Sturdy are immune.
sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.shortDesc: OHKOs a non-Ice target. Fails if user is a lower level.

shellsmash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

shelltrap.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack this turn before it can execute the move.
shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.shortDesc: User must take physical damage before moving.

shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

shockwave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
signalbeam.name: Signal Beam

silverwind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
silverwind.name: Silver Wind
silverwind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

simplebeam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype, Simple, Stance Change, or Truant.
simplebeam.name: Simple Beam

sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sing.name: Sing

sketch.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.shortDesc: Permanently copies the last move target used.

skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Illusion, Multitype, Stance Change, or Wonder Guard, but does not fail if both have the same Ability.
skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

skullbash.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

skydrop.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally or if the target has a substitute.
skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.shortDesc: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

skyuppercut.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.
skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.shortDesc: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
slash.name: Slash

sleeppowder.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sleeppowder.name: Sleep Powder

sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Belch, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

sludge.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludge.name: Sludge

sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb

sludgewave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
sludgewave.name: Sludge Wave

smackdown.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
smackdown.name: Smack Down

smartstrike.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
smartstrike.name: Smart Strike
smartstrike.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

smog.desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smog.name: Smog

smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
smokescreen.name: Smokescreen

snarl.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses one of the following moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move in the same turn, the applicable moves will be stolen in turn order; a move cannot be stolen multiple times. Aqua Ring, Aromatherapy, Autotomize, Belly Drum, Camouflage, Charge, Conversion, Cosmic Power, Cotton Guard, Heal Bell, Healing Wish, Imprison, Ingrain, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Lunar Dance, Magnet Rise, Mist, Power Trick, Quick Guard, Recycle, Reflect, Refresh, Safeguard, Stockpile, Substitute, Swallow, Tailwind, Wide Guard, Wish, and any move that has a primary effect of raising the user's stats or healing the user.
snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.name: Snore
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

soak.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus.
soak.name: Soak
soak.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Water.

softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.
sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom

spacialrend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend

spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.name: Spark

sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

spectralthief.desc: The target's raised stat stages are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage.
spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief
spectralthief.shortDesc: Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.

speedswap.desc: The user swaps its raw Speed stat with the target.
speedswap.name: Speed Swap

spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiderweb.name: Spider Web

spikecannon.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon

spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to three times before failing. Foes lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.name: Spite
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.shortDesc: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

splash.name: Splash
splash.shortDesc: Does nothing (but we still love it).

spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
spore.name: Spore

spotlight.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from other Pokemon are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royale.
spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.shortDesc: Moves redirect to the target on the turn used.

stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in. Can be used only once before failing. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

steameruption.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
steameruption.name: Steam Eruption

steamroller.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
steamroller.name: Steamroller

steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used only once before failing. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3.
stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

stokedsparksurfer.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
stokedsparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer

stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
stomp.name: Stomp

stompingtantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.
stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

stoneedge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
stoneedge.name: Stone Edge

storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.
stormthrow.name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

strengthsap.desc: The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat, calculated with its stat stage, then lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

stringshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
stringshot.name: String Shot

struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to one adjacent foe at random. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up; the Ability Rock Head does not prevent this. This move can only be used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 25% of its max HP as recoil.

strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
strugglebug.name: Struggle Bug
strugglebug.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
submission.name: Submission

substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Ability Infiltrator ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is partially trapped, the partial-trapping effect ends immediately. This move fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a Substitute.

suckerpunch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

sunsteelstrike.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteelstrike.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

supersonic.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
supersonic.name: Supersonic

surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
surf.name: Surf
surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dive.

swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.shortDesc: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

sweetkiss.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss

sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages.
sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent

swift.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
swift.name: Swift
swift.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.
switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

swordsdance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
swordsdance.name: Swords Dance

synchronoise.desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.
tailslap.name: Tail Slap

tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
tailwhip.name: Tail Whip

tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
takedown.name: Take Down

taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious or protected by the Ability Aroma Veil are immune.
taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.shortDesc: For 3 turns, the target can't use status moves.

tearfullook.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Drive.

teeterdance.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance

telekinesis.desc: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.shortDesc: For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.

thief.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.
thief.name: Thief
thief.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

thousandarrows.desc: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
thousandarrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.shortDesc: Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.

thousandwaves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
thousandwaves.name: Thousand Waves
thousandwaves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.

thrash.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

throatchop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.
thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze target. Can't miss in rain.

thunderbolt.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt

thunderfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
thunderfang.name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.

thunderpunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderpunch.name: Thunder Punch

thundershock.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thundershock.name: Thunder Shock

tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

topsyturvy.desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0.
topsyturvy.name: Topsy-Turvy

torment.desc: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect lasts until the target leaves the field.
torment.name: Torment
torment.shortDesc: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
toxic.name: Toxic

toxicspikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, poisoning each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to two times before failing. Foes become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the foe's party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

toxicthread.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.
toxicthread.name: Toxic Thread
toxicthread.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if the target has a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
transform.name: Transform
transform.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

triattack.desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
triattack.name: Tri Attack
triattack.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.
trick.name: Trick
trick.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

trickortreat.desc: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
trickortreat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trickortreat.shortDesc: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).

trickroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon with lower Speed will move before those with higher Speed, within their priority brackets. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, slower Pokemon move first.

triplekick.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids any of the hits. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

tropkick.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
tropkick.name: Trop Kick
tropkick.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

trumpcard.desc: This move does not check accuracy. The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Ability Pressure resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.
trumpcard.name: Trump Card
trumpcard.shortDesc: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

twineedle.desc: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.shortDesc: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.

twister.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.
twister.name: Twister

uproar.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends three turns locked into this move. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means; Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.shortDesc: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

uturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button.
uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

vcreate.desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage.
vcreate.name: V-create
vcreate.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

venomdrench.desc: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned.
venomdrench.name: Venom Drench
venomdrench.shortDesc: Lowers Atk, Sp. Atk, Speed of poisoned foes by 1.

venoshock.desc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.
venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.

vitalthrow.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.

voltswitch.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button.
voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

volttackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

wakeupslap.desc: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.
wakeupslap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wakeupslap.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

waterfall.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.
waterfall.name: Waterfall

waterpledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 Base Power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Ability Serene Grace. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 Base Power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Ability Storm Drain.
waterpledge.name: Water Pledge
waterpledge.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.

waterpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
waterpulse.name: Water Pulse

watershuriken.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times. Base power is 20 if the user is Ash-Greninja.
watershuriken.name: Water Shuriken

watersport.desc: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.
watersport.name: Water Sport
watersport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

waterspout.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
waterspout.name: Water Spout
waterspout.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

weatherball.desc: Power doubles during weather effects and this move's type changes to match; Ice type during Hail, Water type during Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Sunny Day.
weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Ability Suction Cups.
whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

wideguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
wideguard.name: Wide Guard
wideguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from multi-target hits this turn.

wildcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
wildcharge.name: Wild Charge

wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded half up. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
wish.name: Wish
wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

withdraw.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
withdraw.name: Withdraw

wonderroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon have their Defense and Special Defense stats swapped. Stat stage changes are unaffected. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
wonderroom.name: Wonder Room
wonderroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all Defense and Sp. Def stats switch.

woodhammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer

workup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
workup.name: Work Up
workup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

worryseed.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Insomnia, Multitype, Stance Change, or Truant.
worryseed.name: Worry Seed

wrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

wringout.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
wringout.name: Wring Out
wringout.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a major status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still on the field, does not have a major status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

zapcannon.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon

zenheadbutt.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.
zenheadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt

zingzap.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
zingzap.name: Zing Zap
